dmca.title: Infringement Letter Regarding EMM-AUTOTRANSPORT.COM
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Zug, Geordie [mailto:GZug@KSLAW.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 02, 2007 2:21 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Infringement Letter Regarding EMM-AUTOTRANSPORT.COM
Importance: High

 <<Letter - EMM-AUTOTRANSPORT.COM.pdf>> Please find attached a PDF copy
of a letter being sent to you today by certified mail.  The letter
addresses trademark and copyright infringement resulting from a website
for which The Planet is providing hosting services.  The letter requests
that you immediately and permanently disable the website located at
EMM-AUTOTRANSPORT.COM, as well as all associated e-mail capabilities.
We appreciate your assistance with this urgent matter, and ask that you
notify us when the appropriate action has been taken.

Regards,
        
Geordie Zug
Associate
King & Spalding
1185 Avenue of the Americas
New York, NY  10036
Phone: 212-556-2143
Fax: 212-556-2222
Email:  gzug@kslaw.com



                    Confidentiality Notice
This message is being sent by or on behalf of a lawyer.  It is intended
exclusively for the individual or entity to which it is addressed.  This
communication may contain information that is proprietary, privileged or
confidential or otherwise legally exempt from disclosure.  If you are
not the named addressee, you are not authorized to read, print, retain,
copy or disseminate this message or any part of it.  If you have
received this message in error, please notify the sender immediately by
e-mail and delete all copies of the message.
dmca.principal_name: King & Spalding (for United Parcel Service of America, Inc.)
